1.8.9.1.4.2:
Changes/Fixes:
* Fixed big lag issue that had to do with the mana and health bars.
* New setting to disable the message shown when using the stems/deep caverns ores features.
* Added Maddox Batphone to the item cooldowns feature.
* Remove tabs for the gui, add search bar to the gui. Ordered features alphabetically.
* Fixed bars not rendering while riding a horse.
* Fixed kick bug when taking off tarantula helmet in skyblock.
* Fixed language reverting to english after restarting the game sometimes.

* Added new feature that only allows you to mine value ores in the nether.
* Added feature to hide pet hearts while riding an animal or using the skyblock launchpads.
